steps.description: Talk to Zenn Foulhoof and accept Zenn's Bidding
Talk to Syral Bladeleaf and accept Denalan's Earth
Talk to Athridas Bearmantle and accept A Troubling Breeze
Talk to Laurna Morninglight, turn in In Favor of Elune and accept Garments of the Moon, then train your class spells
Talk to Aldia upstairs. Buy and equip a Small Throwing Knife
Talk to Tallonkai Swiftroot atop the Tree and accept Twisted Hatred and The Emerald Dreamcatcher
Talk to Jeena Featherbow. Buy and equip a Hornwood Recurve Bow if you can afford it (2s 85c), if not skip this step. Buy Rough Arrows until your Quiver is full
Talk to Kyra Windblade and train your class spells
Talk to Jannok Breezesong and train your class spells
Talk to Shalomon. Buy and equip a Gladius if you can afford it (5s 36c), if not skip this step
Talk to Shalomon. Buy and equip a Stiletto if you can afford it (4s 1c), if not skip this step
Talk to Shalomon. Buy and equip a Walking Stick if you can afford it (5s 4c), if not skip this step
Talk to Innkeeper Keldamyr, turn in Dolanaar Delivery and set your Hearthstone to Dolanaar
Talk to Dazalar and train Arcane Shot
Talk to Kal and train your class spells
Talk to Corithras Moonrage, turn in Crown of the Earth and accept Crown of the Earth
Talk to Malorne Bladeleaf and train Herbalism. Herbalism is required to gather 5 Earthroot for a level 15 quest later. You can unlearn it afterwards

tips.text: Herbalism is required to gather 5 Earthroot for a level 15 quest later. You can unlearn it afterwards

steps.description: Target Sentinel Shaya. Cast Lesser Heal (Rank 2) and Power Word: Fortitude on Sentinel Shaya
Talk to Denalan, turn in Denalan's Earth and accept Timberling Seeds and Timberling Sprouts
Kill Timberlings. Loot them for their Seeds. Loot the Timberling Sprouts on the ground
Talk to Denalan, turn in Timberling Seeds and Timberling Sprouts, and accept Rellian Greenspyre
Travel to Starbreeze Village
Open Tallonkai's Dresser. Loot it for the Emerald Dreamcatcher
Talk to Gaerolas Talvethren upstairs, turn in A Troubling Breeze and accept Gnarlpine Corruption
Use the Jade Phial at the Starbreeze Village Moonwell

tips.text: Use the Jade Phial at the Starbreeze Village Moonwell

steps.description: Kill Nightsabers. Loot them for their Fangs. Kill Strigid Owls. Loot them for their Feathers. Kill Webwood Lurkers. Loot them for their Silk. Save any Small Eggs and Small Spider Legs to use for leveling Cooking later

tips.text: Save any Small Eggs and Small Spider Legs to use for leveling Cooking later

steps.description: Grind to level 7 +3500xp
Talk to Zenn Foulhoof and turn in Zenn's Bidding
Talk to Syral Bladeleaf and accept Seek Redemption!
Talk to Athridas Bearmantle and turn in Gnarlpine Corruption
Talk to Laurna Morninglight, turn in Garments of the Moon and train your class spells
Talk to Tallonkai Swiftroot atop the Tree, turn in The Emerald Dreamcatcher and accept Ferocitas the Dream Eater
Talk to Jeena Featherbow. Buy and equip a Hornwood Recurve Bow if you can afford it (2s 85c), if not skip this step
Talk to Jeena Featherbow. Buy up to 800 Rough Arrows
Talk to Dazalar and train your class spells
Talk to Kyra Windblade and train your class spells
Talk to Jannok Breezesong and train your class spells
Talk to Shalomon. Buy and equip a Gladius if you can afford it (5s 36c), if not skip this step
Talk to Shalomon. Buy and equip a Stiletto if you can afford it (4s 1c), if not skip this step
Talk to Shalomon. Buy and equip a Walking Stick if you can afford it (5s 4c), if not skip this step
Talk to Corithras Moonrage, turn in Crown of the Earth and accept Crown of the Earth
Talk to Kal and train your class spells
Loot the Fel Cones on the ground. They are usually located next to tree trunks

tips.text: They are usually located next to tree trunks

steps.description: Kill Ferocitas the Dream Eater. Loot him for the Gnarlpine Necklace. Use the Gnarlpine Necklace to loot Tallonkai's Jewel

tips.text: Use the Gnarlpine Necklace to loot Tallonkai's Jewel

steps.description: Kill Gnarlpine Mystics. If there aren't many Gnarlpine Mystics you may have to kill Gnarlpine Warriors to make them spawn

tips.text: If there aren't many Gnarlpine Mystics you may have to kill Gnarlpine Warriors to make them spawn

steps.description: Loot the Fel Cones on the ground. They are usually located next to tree trunks

tips.text: They are usually located next to tree trunks

steps.description: Talk to Zenn Foulhoof and turn in Seek Redemption!
Travel to Fel Rock
Kill Lord Melenas. Loot him for his Head. Lord Melenas may be located in many different spawn locations throughout Fel Rock

tips.text: Lord Melenas may be located in many different spawn locations throughout Fel Rock

steps.description: Talk to Corithras Moonrage and turn in Crown of the Earth
Talk to Corithras Moonrage and accept Crown of the Earth
Travel to southwestern Teldrassil
Click the Strange Fruited Plant and accept The Glowing Fruit
Travel to the Pools of Arlithrien
Use the Tourmaline Phial at the Pools of Arlithrien moonwell

tips.text: Use the Tourmaline Phial at the Pools of Arlithrien moonwell

steps.description: Kill Webwood Lurkers and Webwood Venomfangs. Loot them for their Small Spider Legs
Travel to Dolanaar
Talk to Corithras Moonrage, turn in Crown of the Earth and accept Crown of the Earth
Talk to Zarrin, train Cooking, accept Recipe of the Kaldorei and turn in Recipe of the Kaldorei
Talk to Byancie and train First Aid
Talk to Tallonkai Swiftroot atop the Tree, turn in Twisted Hatred and Ferocitas the Dream Eater
Talk to Moon Priestess Amara and accept The Road to Darnassus. Moon Priestess Amara patrols the road west of Dolanaar

tips.text: Moon Priestess Amara patrols the road west of Dolanaar

steps.description: Kill Gnarlpine Ambushers
Talk to Moon Priestess Amara and turn in The Road to Darnassus. Moon Priestess Amara patrols the road west of Dolanaar

tips.text: Moon Priestess Amara patrols the road west of Dolanaar

steps.description: Travel to The Oracle Glade
Talk to Sentinel Arynia Cloudsbreak and accept The Enchanted Glade
Use the Amethyst Phial at The Oracle Glade moonwell

tips.text: Use the Amethyst Phial at The Oracle Glade moonwell

steps.description: Click the Strange Fronded Plant and accept The Shimmering Frond
Talk to Mist. This will start an escort quest

tips.text: This will start an escort quest

steps.description: Talk to Mist. This will start an escort quest

tips.text: This will start an escort quest

steps.description: Talk to Sentinel Arynia Cloudsbreak, turn in The Enchanted Glade and Mist, and accept Teldrassil
Kill Bloodfeather Harpies. Loot them for their Belts. Bloodfeather Matriarchs cast Healing Wave and Lightning Bolt which does a lot of damage. Try to burst them fast

tips.text: Bloodfeather Matriarchs cast Healing Wave and Lightning Bolt which does a lot of damage. Try to burst them fast

steps.description: Travel to Darnassus
Talk to Rellian Greenspyre, turn in Rellian Greenspyre and accept Tumors
Talk to Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm atop the Tree and turn in Teldrassil
Talk to Mathrengyl Bearwalker on the middle level, accept Moonglade and train your class spells
Talk to Priestess A'moora and accept Tears of the Moon
Cast Teleport: Moonglade. It will be in your spellbook

tips.text: It will be in your spellbook

steps.description: Talk to Dendrite Starblaze upstairs, turn in Moonglade and accept Great Bear Spirit
Talk to the Great Bear Spirit. Seek out the Great Bear Spirit and learn what it has to share with you about the nature of the bear
Cast Teleport: Moonglade. This will make you return faster

tips.text: This will make you return faster

steps.description: Talk to Dendrite Starblaze upstairs, turn in Great Bear Spirit and accept Back to Darnassus
Hearth to Dolanaar
Hearth to Dolanaar
Talk to Jeena Featherbow. Buy 4 stacks of Sharp Arrows. Equip them as soon as you reach level 10

tips.text: Equip them as soon as you reach level 10

steps.description: Talk to Zarrin, train Cooking, accept Recipe of the Kaldorei and turn in Recipe of the Kaldorei
Talk to Moon Priestess Amara and turn in The Road to Darnassus. Moon Priestess Amara patrols the road west of Dolanaar

tips.text: Moon Priestess Amara patrols the road west of Dolanaar

steps.description: Talk to Dazalar, accept Taming the Beast and train your level 10 spells
Use the Taming Rod on a Webwood Lurker. Tame a Webwood Lurker

tips.text: Use the Taming Rod on a Webwood Lurker

steps.description: Talk to Dazalar, turn in Taming the Beast and accept Taming the Beast
Talk to Corithras Moonrage, turn in Crown of the Earth and accept Crown of the Earth
Talk to Denalan and turn in The Shimmering Frond and The Glowing Fruit
Talk to Denalan and turn in The Moss-twined Heart
Click on Denalans Planter and turn in Planting the Heart
Use the Taming Rod on a Nightsaber Stalker. You must right click your Pet Frame and Dismiss your pet before you can tame another one. Tame a Nightsaber Stalker

tips.text: You must right click your Pet Frame and Dismiss your pet before you can tame another one

steps.description: Talk to Laurna Morninglight and train your class spells
Talk to Kyra Windblade and train your class spells
Talk to Jannok Breezesong and train your class spells
Talk to Dazalar, accept Taming the Beast and train your class spells
Use the Taming Rod on a Webwood Lurker. Tame a Webwood Lurker

tips.text: Use the Taming Rod on a Webwood Lurker

steps.description: Talk to Dazalar, turn in Taming the Beast and accept Taming the Beast
Use the Taming Rod on a Nightsaber Stalker. You must right click your Pet Frame and Dismiss your pet before you can tame another one. Tame a Nightsaber Stalker

tips.text: You must right click your Pet Frame and Dismiss your pet before you can tame another one

steps.description: Talk to Dazalar, turn in Taming the Beast and accept Taming the Beast
Use the Taming Rod on a Strigid Screecher. You must right click your Pet Frame and Dismiss your pet before you can tame another one. Tame a Strigid Screecher

tips.text: You must right click your Pet Frame and Dismiss your pet before you can tame another one

steps.description: Talk to Dazalar, turn in Taming the Beast and accept Training the Beast
Talk to Moon Priestess Amara and accept Elanaria. Moon Priestess Amara patrols the road west of Dolanaar

tips.text: Moon Priestess Amara patrols the road west of Dolanaar

steps.description: Talk to Jannok Breezesong and accept The Apple Falls
Talk to Shalomon. Buy a Walking Stick. You will equip this later. Skip this step if you happened to find a different staff

tips.text: You will equip this later. Skip this step if you happened to find a different staff

steps.description: Talk to Moon Priestess Amara and turn in The Road to Darnassus. Moon Priestess Amara patrols the road west of Dolanaar

tips.text: Moon Priestess Amara patrols the road west of Dolanaar

steps.description: Travel to Darnassus
Talk to Rellian Greenspyre, turn in Rellian Greenspyre and accept Tumors
Talk to Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm atop the Tree, turn in Crown of the Earth and Teldrassil, and accept Grove of the Ancients
Talk to Syurna, turn in The Apple Falls and accept Destiny Calls
Talk to Priestess A'moora and accept Tears of the Moon
Cast Tame Beast on a Strigid Hunter to tame it. Attack mobs with it to learn Claw (Rank 2). Click here for more info about pet training

tips.text: Attack mobs with it to learn Claw (Rank 2)
Click here for more info about pet training

steps.description: Kill Timberling Tramplers, Timberling Mire Beasts and Elder Timberlings. Loot them for their Tumors
Kill Lady Sathrah. Loot it for its Spinnerets. Lady Sathrah can spawn in 3 different locations

tips.text: Lady Sathrah can spawn in 3 different locations

steps.description: Cast Pick Pocket on Sethir the Ancient. You must be in Stealth to use Pick Pocket. Sethir the Ancient walks along the big tree branch. Avoid fighting Sethir the Ancient. Let him walk passed you, then Stealth and Pick Pocket when you're behind him

tips.text: You must be in Stealth to use Pick Pocket
Sethir the Ancient walks along the big tree branch
Avoid fighting Sethir the Ancient. Let him walk passed you, then Stealth and Pick Pocket when you're behind him

steps.description: Talk to Sentinel Arynia Cloudsbreak and accept The Enchanted Glade
Kill Bloodfeather Harpies. Loot them for their Belts. Bloodfeather Matriarchs cast Healing Wave and Lightning Bolt which does a lot of damage. Try to burst them fast

tips.text: Bloodfeather Matriarchs cast Healing Wave and Lightning Bolt which does a lot of damage. Try to burst them fast

steps.description: Talk to Mist. This will start an escort quest

tips.text: This will start an escort quest

steps.description: Talk to Sentinel Arynia Cloudsbreak and turn in Mist
Talk to Sentinel Arynia Cloudsbreak, turn in The Enchanted Glade and accept Teldrassil
Travel to Darnassus
Talk to Mydrannul and accept Nessa Shadowsong
Talk to Elanaria, turn in Elanaria and accept Vorlus Vilehoof
Travel toward Vorlus Vilehoof
Kill Vorlus Vilehoof. Loot him for his Horn
Travel to Darnassus
Talk to Elanaria and turn in Vorlus Vilehoof
Talk to Mathrengyl Bearwalker on the middle level, turn in Back to Darnassus and accept Body and Heart
Talk to Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm, turn in Crown of the Earth and accept Grove of the Ancients
Talk to Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm, turn in Teldrassil and accept Grove of the Ancients
Talk to Jocaste and turn in Training the Beast
Talk to Syurna and turn in Destiny Calls
Talk to Rellian Greenspyre and turn in Tumors
Travel toward Turian
Talk to Rellian Greenspyre on the second floor. Buy a Balanced Throwing Dagger
Talk to Priestess A'moora, turn in Tears of the Moon and accept Sathrah's Sacrifice
Use Sathrah's Sacrifice at the fountain. Offer the sacrifice at the fountain

tips.text: Use Sathrah's Sacrifice at the fountain

steps.description: Talk to Priestess A'moora and turn in Sathrah's Sacrifice
Talk to Firodren Mooncaller and train Herbalism. Herbalism is required to gather 5 Earthroot for a level 15 quest later. You can unlearn it afterwards

tips.text: Herbalism is required to gather 5 Earthroot for a level 15 quest later. You can unlearn it afterwards

steps.description: Talk to Ilyenia Moonfire and train Staves. If you have a Staff in your bags, equip it

tips.text: If you have a Staff in your bags, equip it

steps.description: Equip the Walking Stick
Talk to Ariyell Skyshadow. Buy and equip a Laminated Recurve Bow. Buy Sharp Arrows
Talk to Ariyell Skyshadow. Buy a Quarter Staff. Equip it at level 11

tips.text: Equip it at level 11

steps.description: Talk to Ariyell Skyshadow. Buy and equip a Cutlass if you can't afford a Quarter Staff

tips.text: if you can't afford a Quarter Staff

steps.description: Travel through the purple portal to Rut'theran Village
Talk to Nessa Shadowsong, turn in Nessa Shadowsong and accept The Bounty of Teldrassil
Talk to Vesprystus, turn in The Bounty of Teldrassil and accept Flight to Auberdine
Talk to Vesprystus and fly to Darkshore
